revised_title: Research on Fossil Reptilia and the Classification of Karroo Formation Mammals
tldr: The author examines the structure, organization, and classification of fossil reptiles, specifically focusing on the Karroo formation of Cape Colony. He reevaluates the carpus structure and transfers Theriodesmus from Mammalia to Therosuchia. Additionally, he investigates the skull of Tritylodon longiceps and its similarities to Theriodonts, suggesting it is reptilian.
